permissions.name: <all_urls>
permissions.notes: Full read/write access to all websites; credential theft, injection, scraping

permissions.name: webRequestBlocking
permissions.notes: Can block/modify all requests → MITM-like capability

permissions.name: proxy
permissions.notes: Full traffic redirection; extreme risk if malicious

permissions.name: tabs
permissions.notes: URLs and titles only; less sensitive than full host access

permissions.name: browsingData
permissions.notes: It allows extensions to delete browsing history, cookies and ceched data across all websites

permissions.name: privacy
permissions.notes: Allows extensions to control Chrome settings that affect user privacy (ie Do Not Track, third-party cookies, autofill, etc).

permissions.name: offscreen
permissions.notes: Allows hidden background execution, enabling stealthy activity without user awareness

permissions.name: clipboardWrite
permissions.notes: Can overwrite clipboard; phishing vector possible

permissions.name: fileSystem
permissions.notes: Local file access; data exfiltration risk

permissions.name: nativeMessaging
permissions.notes: Bridge to local OS programs; high escalation potential

permissions.name: dns
permissions.notes: Can manipulate DNS requests; redirect or poison traffic

permissions.name: sidePanel
permissions.notes: Persistent window into browsing, could be used for tracking.
